name: George Bergman
text: I posted sometime ago. Marcos in Mt.Vernon has gotten alot better on service. Thet even corrected by sending me a voucher for a free pizza. Pizza is pretty good, subs are good too. Price $$ kinda expensive but in the same range as other …More

name: Awkward Steve
text: So sad they closed. The one time I was there I absolutely loved it! I'm a HUGE fan of their pizza and absolutely love the pepperoni manifico pizza! I really wish i could've gone again, but sadly, like I said, they're closed. :(

name: Heather Bocock
text: Great pizza! Some times it takes a little while for carry outs but I have yet to be disappointed. The employees are friendly and helpful. They have great coupons online too! We will definitely be purchasing from here again.

name: Juliet Bravo
text: I've lived in Mount Vernon for only about 18 months--transferred from the West Coast.  Tonight was my first visit to Marco's--I missed out and should have tried them a long time ago!  I was really impressed with their pizza.  I ordered a …More

name: Linda Rainey
text: Love their pizzas.  So nice to order movies and have your pizza cook at same time  bring all home for a pizza movie night

name: Trevor Campbell
text: This was the first time ordering it and my friend said that her pepperoni thin crust pizza tastes like cardboard ,and she would much rather of had a frozen pizza from Kroger!!! My specialty pizza was way to doughy and it even had bubbles in …More

name: Joanna Filkins
text: White cheesy pizza was very tasty!!! Very small wings but good flavor. Great customer service!

name: Stacey Ruble
text: Polite knowledgeable staff. Perfectly baked and topped thin crust loaded pizza. Will definitely go back.

name: Dee Ford
text: They were the only place open on Christmas Eve. Only 2 guys working. So busy taking phone orders, it was quite a wait for those there in person. Pizza was good & tasty.

name: Cody Yoda
text: Order pizza at 830 on Christmas, they were fast and it was good . I felt bad but had drove 7hours and did not want to feed kids gas station food and just about every restaurant in the area was closed . Driver was pleasant which considering she had to work on Christmas was awesome .

name: beth marshall
text: I ordered at 430 so it would be ready.  I let them know we needed it at 515.  My husband went to pick up our Pizza and was there at 515.  They charged my card didn't give him a receipt and left him waiting for 45 minutes.  I called the …More

name: Joyce Howard
text: I Love Marco's Delicious pineapple ham pizza along with Marco's Italian toasted sub sandwich the service here is fast and friendly

name: KATHLEEN WOLFE
text:
Staying at hotel in Mt Vernon, IL. Ordered Pizza at 5:45. Was told it would be 45 min
No Pizza by 7:15 so called again. Was told it had left the restaurant and driver …More

name: Martin Cates
text: Ok I love the pizza, tho I'm a Chicago type and miss northern pizza, it's thin crust is really good. Online order is hit or miss. It's the best pizza in town imo, but if you order online, call if it's not there in 20 mins. If they make a …More

name: Mike Meyer
text: I ordered the meatball bake and it was grrreatttt , pleaseant experiance from from the ordering to the prompt delivery. The food was worth every penny I spent. your pizza is just as good

name: Paul Rainwater
text: Great food and they will deliver.  Doesn't matter if it's a pizza or a sub, plus you get a movie rental coupon for next door.

name: Taylor Crawford
text: Good food, I love the thin crust! Prices are a little high

name: Rhonda Pina
text: Quick..food very good! Really nice people!

name: Brent Toast
text: Great new pizza place inside family video very fast delivery the pizza I had tasted pretty good

name: Gary King
text: Good tasting pizza and subs and quick service always ready when I arrive to pick up

text: Always fast and very polite. And great food.
